questions.question: Set on a winter island, this arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates' conflict with a corrupt royal family and a rebel army. What is...?
This arc focuses on the backstory of Sanji and his connections to the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
Set in the dangerous New World, this arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' alliance with the Heart Pirates to take down one of the Four Emperors. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to manipulate and become light. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, allows him to extract and manipulate the souls of others. What is...?
This technique, utilized by a member of the Straw Hat Pirates, involves creating an illusion of multiple copies. What is...?
This character, also known as 'Black Leg', is the Straw Hat Pirates' chef and a master of Black Leg Style martial arts. Who is...?
This character, known for their control over ice and introduction in the Whole Cake Island arc, is one of the three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'God', was the former ruler of Skypiea and wielder of a powerful staff called the 'Goro Goro no Mi'. Who is...?
